TextBlock.Text: SECCA: We will miss Escall dearly.
DIN: He was a true explorer, a true leader of his clan. I hope we will meet with them again... Annona, Plume, Coleus, and others...
SECCA: I hope so too, Din. It's time for us to go. The voice is calling us..
DIN: If someone ever reads this message in search of us, please be cautious. We have no idea what awaits us ahead. Good luck to us and to you.
SECCA: By the way, there's still fuel left in Escall's spacesuit helmet. You can refuel before we leave.
DIN: That's a good idea, thank you.
